name: Chocolate Nice Cream
description: You won’t believe this “nice” cream is vegan! Chocolatey and rich, it’s a healthier treat that the whole family will love. Try it with Power Up Vanilla Protein Blend to switch up the flavours.

ingredients.name: Summer Berry Sweet Dip Mix or Dark & Dreamy Hot Chocolate Mix

preparation: Place bananas, sweet dip mix, and protein blend in food processor and blend until creamy, scraping down the sides as necessary. Fold in berries and serve immediately.

products.name: Summer Berry Sweet Dip Mix
summary: If you could capture sweet summer in a jar, this would be it. A tangy, fruity blend of raspberries, strawberries, hibiscus, and a touch of rooibos, Summer Berry works as a dip or seasoning for yogurt, oatmeal, smoothies, and more.

products.name: Dark & Dreamy Hot Chocolate Mix
summary: A coffee shop favourite at a fraction of the cost! Make your own at home and Warm up on a cold fall or winter day with a decadently rich and smooth hot chocolate.

products.name: Power Up Chocolate Protein Blend (Pouch)
summary: We like to fuel our bodies and satisfy those chocolate cravings at the same time. Made with pea and fava bean protein, this blend turns into a velvety shake (just mix with water or milk) or morning smoothie with a luscious creamy texture, not chalky like a lot of other protein powders. It’s made with heat-stable probiotics which means baking with benefits! Add to pancake, waffle, muffin, or cookie batters. Power up your morning with an extra boost from 20 g of plant-based protein and essential amino acids.
